detaileddescription.para:
Create a button objects
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new button
copy
pointer to a button object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created button

Enable the toggled states. On release the button will change from/to toggled state.
btn
pointer to a button object
tgl
true: enable toggled states, false: disable
Enable the toggled states
btn
pointer to a button object
tgl
true: enable toggled states, false: disable

Set the state of the button
btn
pointer to a button object
state
the new state of the button (from lv_btn_state_t enum)

Toggle the state of the button (ON->OFF, OFF->ON)
btn
pointer to a button object

Set the layout on a button
btn
pointer to a button object
layout
a layout from 'lv_cont_layout_t'

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_obj_t *btn, lv_fit_t left, lv_fit_t right, lv_fit_t top, lv_fit_t bottom)
memberdef.name: lv_btn_set_fit4

detaileddescription.para:
Set the fit policy in all 4 directions separately. It tell how to change the button size automatically.
btn
pointer to a button object
left
left fit policy from lv_fit_t
right
right fit policy from lv_fit_t
top
bottom fit policy from lv_fit_t
bottom
bottom fit policy from lv_fit_t

Set the fit policy horizontally and vertically separately. It tell how to change the button size automatically.
btn
pointer to a button object
hot
horizontal fit policy from lv_fit_t
ver
vertical fit policy from lv_fit_t

Set the fit policy in all 4 direction at once. It tell how to change the button size automatically.
btn
pointer to a button object
fit
fit policy from lv_fit_t

Set time of the ink effect (draw a circle on click to animate in the new state)
btn
pointer to a button object
time
the time of the ink animation

Set the wait time before the ink disappears
btn
pointer to a button object
time
the time of the ink animation

Set time of the ink out effect (animate to the released state)
btn
pointer to a button object
time
the time of the ink animation

Set a style of a button.
btn
pointer to button object
type
which style should be set
style
pointer to a style
Set a style of a button
btn
pointer to a button object
type
which style should be set
style
pointer to a style

Get the current state of the button
btn
pointer to a button object
the state of the button (from lv_btn_state_t enum)

Get the toggle enable attribute of the button
btn
pointer to a button object
ture: toggle enabled, false: disabled

Get the layout of a button
btn
pointer to button object
the layout from 'lv_cont_layout_t'

Get the left fit mode
btn
pointer to a button object
an element of lv_fit_t

Get the right fit mode
btn
pointer to a button object
an element of lv_fit_t

Get the top fit mode
btn
pointer to a button object
an element of lv_fit_t

Get the bottom fit mode
btn
pointer to a button object
an element of lv_fit_t

Get time of the ink in effect (draw a circle on click to animate in the new state)
btn
pointer to a button object
the time of the ink animation

Get the wait time before the ink disappears
btn
pointer to a button object
the time of the ink animation

Get time of the ink out effect (animate to the releases state)
btn
pointer to a button object
the time of the ink animation

Get style of a button.
btn
pointer to button object
type
which style should be get
style pointer to the style Get a style of a button
btn
pointer to a button object
type
which style should be get
style pointer to a style
